web3.copyright.note: Information provided is general and educational in nature. It is not intended to be, and should not be construed as, legal or tax advice. Rules and regulations regarding tax deductions for charitable giving vary at the country and state level, and laws of a specific country, state or laws relevant to a particular situation may affect the applicability, accuracy, or completeness of the information provided. Please consult a tax advisor about the legal or tax consequences of donating in cryptocurrency. All organization names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners, and are used on this website for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.

sdg.description.text: The Sustainable Development Goals or SDGs are a collection of 17 goals designed to be a "blueprint to achieve a better and more sustainable future for all"

web3.successModal.share.subtitle: Help this good cause by inviting your friends
web3.successModal.blockchain.text: A txid or Tr ansaction ID is a string of letters and numbersthat identifies a specific transaction on the blockchain. As the name suggests, it literally ‚Äúconfirms‚Äù that the funds have been sent to the correct address and not to anyone else.

web3.homepage.support.title: We help you support the causes you care about
web3.homepage.support.subtitle: We are bringing transparency, efficiency, and governance into the philanthropic sector and ESG market by innovating the ways we help causes and nonprofits all around the world.
web3.homepage.box1.title: Maximize your impact
web3.homepage.box1.subtitle: Have a real-world impact with your crypto profits, furthering the mission of the causes you donate to
web3.homepage.box2.title: Donate anonymously
web3.homepage.box2.subtitle: You can donate crypto anonymously. Support the causes you care about and maintain your privacy
web3.homepage.box3.title: No platform fees
web3.homepage.box3.subtitle: Give crypto directly to a nonprofit, and 100% of your donation can go to the causes you care about
web3.homepage.box4.title: Encourage transparency
web3.homepage.box4.subtitle: Help promote transparent giving and encourage wider adoption of crypto
